My name is Ryan Wang, and I'm a representative from the Metropolitan Transit Authority.
And it is my honor to announce that this subway car has been recognized officially...
...as the most courteous subway car in the entire New York City subway system.
We are providing you a pizza party,...
...so please give yourselves a round of applause for your outstanding behavior.

...and this train has the lowest percentage of manspreading of any car...
